content: measures 1 inch thick bind off all stitches in pattern and break yarn neckband with 3 5 mm needles starting from the back right corner of the neckline pick up and knit sts at the following rates 1 st for every 1 st along the back approximately 53 sts 2 sts for every 3 sts along the shoulder saddle approximately 16 sts 2 sts for every 3 row along the neckline slope approximately 16 sts wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com 1 st for every 1 st along the cast on edge of the neckline approximately 39 sts 2 sts for every 3 row along the neckline slope approximately 16 sts 2 sts for every 3 sts along the shoulder saddle approximately 16 sts you should have pick up and knit 156 sts 2x2 rib k2 p2 to end repeat the above round 19 more times or until neckband measures 2 5 inches thick bind off all stitches in pattern and break yarn armbands with 3 5 mm needles starting from the bottom of the armhole pick up and knit sts at a rate of about 2 sts for every 3 row and 1 st for every 1 st you should have pick up and knit 84 88 92 96 100 104 112 116 120 sts 2x2 rib k2 p2 to end repeat the above round 7 more times or until neckband measures 1 inch thick bind off all stitches in pattern and break yarn congratulations you are finished tag me on instagram @knittygritty_sg and use the hashtag #deeringpullover to share your work i am excited to see all your beautiful creations wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com
